participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Creative and adventurous, Ethan is passionate about sports and enjoys exploring new flavors in coffee.
participant_1.background: i played football for a division a college. i try various coffees as a hobby. i am a huge star wars fan. i enjoy poetry.

participant_2.background: my favorite activity is rock climbing. i'm a mechanical engineer. i like to go hiking in the spring. i live in colorado.
